name: Dark Age of Death
description: Dark Age of Death is a NEW MMORPG Game that brings the medieval fantasy to life with stunning Graphics and "Open World" maps you can discover the worlds full with enemies. New adventures awaits you on these cursed lands. With bosses that are challanging to the player and with New Quests, Environments, Characters, Dialogue, Armor and Weapons. You can fight alone, with a small team or in armies for PvE and PvP battles. The players can explore the Ruins, Dungeons, Castles there are Empires that you can join and Raid other Kingdoms with your King, gain fame wealth and items or die in battle and ascend to Valhalla.
